info.title: Configuration for access control on Dubbo services.

dubbo.aeraki.io.v1alpha1.DubboAuthorizat.description: DubboAuthorizationPolicy enables access control on Dubbo services.

rules.description: Optional. A list of rules to match the request. A match occurs when at least one rule matches the request.

dubbo.aeraki.io.v1alpha1.Rule.description: Rule matches requests from a list of sources that perform a list of operations subject to a list of conditions. A match occurs when at least one source, one operation and all conditions matches the request. An empty rule is always matched.

from.description: Optional. from specifies the source of a request.

to.description: Optional. to specifies the operation of a request.

dubbo.aeraki.io.v1alpha1.DubboAuthorizat.description: Action specifies the operation to take.

dubbo.aeraki.io.v1alpha1.Rule.From.description: From includes a list or sources.

dubbo.aeraki.io.v1alpha1.Rule.To.description: To includes a list or operations.

dubbo.aeraki.io.v1alpha1.Source.description: Source specifies the source identities of a request. Fields in the source are ANDed together.

principals.description: Optional. A list of source peer identities (i.e. service account), which matches to the "source.principal" attribute. This field requires mTLS enabled.

notPrincipals.description: Optional. A list of negative match of source peer identities.

namespaces.description: Optional. A list of namespaces, which matches to the "source.namespace" attribute. This field requires mTLS enabled.

notNamespaces.description: Optional. A list of negative match of namespaces.

dubbo.aeraki.io.v1alpha1.Operation.description: Operation specifies the operations of a request. Fields in the operation are ANDed together.

interfaces.description: Optional. A list of interfaces, which matches to the Dubbo interface.

notInterfaces.description: Optional. A list of negative match of interfaces.

methods.description: Optional. A list of methods, which matches to the Dubbo methods.

notMethods.description: Optional. A list of negative match of methods.
